channel.title: Fixed old problem but now i got a new one
channel.description:
Hi i added a new minigame to my server and its pissing me off how i did everything right but when i compile i get four errors that say this
NPCHandler.java:1367: Player is already defined in MonsterDropItem(int) int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
^ NPCHandler.java:1374: Player is already defined in MonsterDropItem(int) int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; ^ NPCHandler.java:1382: Player is already defined in MonsterDropItem(int) int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; ^ NPCHandler.java:1390: Player is already defined in MonsterDropItem(int) int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; ^
I dont know what is going on cause plus when i kill the monsters in the minigame i added they dont make me teleport like they are supposed to what do i do?!?!?!?

item.title: Fixed old problem but now i got a new one
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

The integer ‘Player’ is already defined in the MonsterDropItem method. Also you need to fix the errors before your server code will update.

Read full topic
item.source: Fixed old problem but now i got a new one

item.title: Fixed old problem but now i got a new one
item.dc:creator: @LOLMFAO LOLMFAO
item.description:
@LOLMFAO wrote:

  1. Did you make any of these twice?
  2. Use the code tags
[code][/code]

Read full topic

Hi i added a new minigame to my server and its pissing me off how i did everything right but when i compile i get four errors that say this
